text: “allāh pahaḷa kaḷa meya, oba viśvāsa karanu” yayi ovunṭa kiyanu læbuvahot “apagē (nabivarun) veta pahaḷa karanu læbū dæya (pamaṇak) viśvāsa karamu” yayi pavasā ēvā misa, meya (mema dharmaya) pratikṣēpa kara harinnāha. namut meya nam, ovun veta æti dæya (tavrātaya) satyaya kara tabana satya (dharmaya) vaśayen ættēya. (nabiyē! ovunṭa) oba mesē kiyanu: “(obagē dharmayama) ættenma oba viśvāsa kaḷavun vaśayen siṭinnē nam, (obagen ikut vū) allāhgē nabivarunva mīṭa pera oba kumak nisā ghātanaya kaḷehuda?”
